---
title: "Schedule"
---

In general, there will be a mix of lecture material, interactive exercises, field excursions, and labs in the hours between breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Meals and the time before breakfast and after dinner will be reserved for socialization and free time for exploration and rest.

The local timezone is Mountain Daylight Time (UTC-6). Sunrise will be \~6:15am and sunset will be \~8:00pm.

Meals will be served in the billy barr Community Center (bbcc).

| Breakfast   | Lunch       | Dinner      |
|-------------|-------------|-------------|
| 7:00-8:00am | Noon-1:00pm | 6:00-7:00pm |

::: callout-important
The workshop schedule below is a rough draft. Additional changes will be made as the workshop plan is finalized.
:::

## Prior to arrival: Prep work

We will have readings and prep-work for you to complete before the workshop begins. This will include things like installing and (re)familiarizing yourself with [R](https://www.r-project.org).
